sub_title: Unilever Hygienic Design Expert ~ EU Quality
summary:
Hygienic processing experience since 2010. 
Auditing and supporting factories on hygienic design (both internal and at our contractors).
Direct contact with suppliers and organisations (e.g. EHEDG).
Microbiological expertise built regarding food spoilage and food safety.
Knowledge on cross category hygienic processing (both Foods and HBPC products), GMP, HACCP, and HPC420.
Furthermore big interest in IT related stuff.

Besides work also member and former captain of the Unilever Vitality Runners, which is one of the more than 250 teams participating in the Roparun. A huge charity event in the Netherlands to raise money for palliative care for cancer patients (check www.vitalityrunners.nl).

inventors.headline: Unilever Hygienic Design Expert ~ EU Quality

patents.title: Water continuous product stabilised with acetic acid

profile_positions.description:
In this role I will:
1) Lead and assist Hygienic Process Assessments, particularly in the area of hygienic design, cleaning & disinfection processes, and be involved in hygiene risk assessments for the business, more specifically in the areas of:
○ Innovation Projects
○ Transformation Projects
○ Daily Manufacturing (SUs / CMs)

2) give appropriate guidance and advice on:
○ Hygienic design of equipment, processes, and infrastructure, by using the current appropriate standards, procedures, control & optimization techniques.
○ Cleaning & disinfection process & product monitoring, testing, and validation/verification/monitoring.

3) Share hygienic design knowledge across the different Unilever, CM, and Supplier functions, and when necessary be involved in training.

4) Liaise with many functions within UEBV such as: Manufacturing, Procurement, R&D, to ensure appropriate ways of working & systems are well defined, documented, and compliant with applicable regulations and standards.
profile_positions.title: EU Quality - Hygienic Design Expert

profile_positions.description:
In my role as global hygienic processing specialist I do have the following responsibilities:
-	Assess processing lines on hygienic design --> this applies to both foods and HBPC processing.
                --> Using Hygienic processing knowledge, HACCP, GMP and Cleaning and Disinfection guidelines
-	Perform trainings (Unilever and 3rd parties, around the world) on the principles of hygienic design 
-	Write and update internal standards 
-	Update and maintain HACCP documentation
-	Work in close collaboration with external companies on the optimization of Cleaning and Disinfection of processing lines.
-	Assess equipment (both new and old) and discuss with manufacturers to improve the hygienic design up to our standards.
profile_positions.title: Global Hygienic Processing Specialist

profile_positions.description:
One year secondment in this role - started September 2019.
Challenging and interesting role with a lot of interaction with sourcing units (both Unilever as well as external companies).
Still big focus on hygiene and disinfection, but also more deep dive into allergens.

Main activities: hygiene assessments, audits, training and other on-site support focused on C&D and hygiene.
profile_positions.title: Product Group Quality Manager Europe

profile_positions.description:
Food microbiologist with relevant experience in the food processing area.
Main expertise: Microbiological safety of spreads and (as of 2010 also focused on) hygienic proces design; performing hygiene assessments of processing lines.
profile_positions.title: Scientist - Microbiologist

profile_positions.description:
Factory microbiologist on QA laboratory, performing default microbiological clearances on ingredients and final products.
(Maternity leave replacement)
profile_positions.title: Factory microbiologist

volunteer_experiences.role: Team captain of Unilever Vitality Runners (Team 51, also runner)
volunteer_experiences.description:
Since 2014 member of the Unilever Vitality Runners Roparun team (Team 51), who will run each year in relay form, from Paris to Rotterdam to raise money to help people beating cancer.
Since 2015, teamcaptain of this fantastic team :) !

Do you like to read more about the Roparun, or make a donation, please read: http://www.roparun.nl/ or http://www.vitalityrunners.nl/
